name: APB Reloaded Urban Survival Pack
detailed_description:
The APB Urban Survival Pack includes:
  • Character Title “Steampunk”: Steam Exclusive Lifetime Title to make your character unique and stand out in the streets of San Paro.
  • Act 44 “Last Stand”: Retail Exclusive Lifetime Secondary Weapon perfect for close-quarter killing.
  • Premium (30 Days Total) – Premium Membership benefits include:
    • Up to 90% Bonus XP
    • 125% Bonus in-game currency (APB$) earnings
    • 50% reduced cooldown on activated abilities
    • Advanced customization abilities
    • 20% Discount on Armas Marketplace purchases
  • 500 G1 Credits – Buy even more unique Weapons, Vehicles, and customizations from the Armas Marketplace in-game cash-shop.
  • Cisco Z180 Vehicle – Character Lifetime sports car with a unique design.
  • Weapons for every play style (50 Days Total):
    • Joker CR5 (Assault Rifle)
    • OCA-626 'Whisper' PR2 (Submachine Gun)
    • Silenced N-HVR PR1 (Sniper Rifle)
    • OBIR NFCP 3 (Burst Fire Rifle)
    • ALIG 762 R&D III (Light Machine Gun)

To redeem the APB Urban Survival Pack after purchase:
  • Login with your GamersFirst account to the Armas Marketplace http://www.gamersfirst.com/marketplace/ingame/redeem_code.php?gameID=20
  • Click the “Redeem Code” button at the top of the page
  • Enter your code in the box and click enter. Choose your character and you are ready to go! Your Premium will immediately apply to your account, and your items will be sent to your chosen character's in-game mailbox.
about_the_game:
The APB Urban Survival Pack includes:
  • Character Title “Steampunk”: Steam Exclusive Lifetime Title to make your character unique and stand out in the streets of San Paro.
  • Act 44 “Last Stand”: Retail Exclusive Lifetime Secondary Weapon perfect for close-quarter killing.
  • Premium (30 Days Total) – Premium Membership benefits include:
    • Up to 90% Bonus XP
    • 125% Bonus in-game currency (APB$) earnings
    • 50% reduced cooldown on activated abilities
    • Advanced customization abilities
    • 20% Discount on Armas Marketplace purchases
  • 500 G1 Credits – Buy even more unique Weapons, Vehicles, and customizations from the Armas Marketplace in-game cash-shop.
  • Cisco Z180 Vehicle – Character Lifetime sports car with a unique design.
  • Weapons for every play style (50 Days Total):
    • Joker CR5 (Assault Rifle)
    • OCA-626 'Whisper' PR2 (Submachine Gun)
    • Silenced N-HVR PR1 (Sniper Rifle)
    • OBIR NFCP 3 (Burst Fire Rifle)
    • ALIG 762 R&D III (Light Machine Gun)

To redeem the APB Urban Survival Pack after purchase:
  • Login with your GamersFirst account to the Armas Marketplace http://www.gamersfirst.com/marketplace/ingame/redeem_code.php?gameID=20
  • Click the “Redeem Code” button at the top of the page
  • Enter your code in the box and click enter. Choose your character and you are ready to go! Your Premium will immediately apply to your account, and your items will be sent to your chosen character's in-game mailbox.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Windows XP
  • Processor:Intel Core 2 Duo E6420 (2.13GHz) or AMD Athlon x2 5800+ (3.0GHz)
  • Memory:3 GB RAM
  • Graphics:GeForce 7800 with 256MB and support for Pixel Shader 3.0, or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX®:dx90c
  • Hard Drive:7 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS:Windows Vista 64-Bit / Windows 7 64-Bit
  • Processor:2.4GHz Intel Core 2 Quad or equivalent AMD x4
  • Memory:4 GB RAM
  • Graphics:GeForce 8800GT 512MB or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX®:dx90c
  • Hard Drive:7 GB HD space
  • Sound:Dedicated sound card with hardware acceleration.
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
